alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Kenedy Island; Willacy Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 3:03AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kenedy, northwestern Cameron and eastern Willacy Counties through 345 AM CST... At 302 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rio Hondo Elementary School, or near Rio Hondo, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harlingen, Rio Hondo, Arroyo City, Port Mansfield, Texas State Technical College Harlingen, Harlingen Arts And Heritage Museum, Port Mansfield Airport, Harlingen Soccer Complex, Harlingen Fire Department, and Marine Military Academy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Kenedy Island; Willacy Island
